item.title: Gems, rails developers cannot overlook
item.description: We are talking about some powerful Gems in Rails. So first of all what comes to our mind is that what are gems? There are some well known and common genre of problems that web developers face everyday. Take user authentication as an example. With technology, user wants to log in to all the systems with one account (with just a single sign up!). Say, I want to buy products from online but I do not want to create a new account on each of these e-commerce sites rather I want to sign into each one those with my gmail / facebook / twitter /… account. As these common problems recur, trying to solve them again and again will be a waste of our effort and this will take away the required attention from the application we want to develop. Basically Gems are ruby software packages which provide the solutions to these common problems. They are not necessarily related to Rails but Ruby. Most of these gems are available on github and developed by talented open-source developers. Here are some of them, which will probably blow away most of the headaches of Rails developers.
